metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3957 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in GPAC. Affected by this vulnerability is the function svg_parse_preserveaspectratio of the file scenegraph/svg_attributes.c of the component SVG Parser. The manipulation leads to memory leak. The attack can be launched remotely. The name of the patch is 2191e66aa7df750e8ef01781b1930bea87b713bb. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-213463.

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
